name: Boomtown Bowling
description:
Boomtown needs to be demolished, and they're trusting you, a bowling ball, to do the job!

Destroy the town, and get as many points as you can within the time limit!

Fill up your rampage meter and detonate!

Charge up and go BALListic!

Made for PegJam, 2016.

by Matt Woelk and Dustin Bogers
